definition: a method of treating disease with extremely diluted remedies that, in large amounts in healthy people, produce symptoms similar to those being treated
details:
noun
- a method of treating disease with extremely diluted remedies that, in large amounts in healthy people, produce symptoms similar to those being treated
= example: a method of treating disease with extremely diluted remedies that, in large amounts in healthy people, produce symptoms similar to those being treated
= synonyms: homoeopathy
